user_device_rel: 1 person to n devices; n people to m devices
target_users: Group work; Use in multi-user and multi-machine environments (i.e. iRoom)
use_cases_desc: Operating multi-user and multi-machine environment (i.e. interactive room)
contribution_desc: The Point Right system enables users to operate a multi-machine, multi-user environment with the same pointer/mouse and keyboard devices. It uses iROS and EventHeap for event redirection to particular systems in the multi-machine environment.
